name: Medium
description: Medium is an online platform for professional and amateur writers to publish articles. It is also a social platform where users can follow each other and recommend articles.

feedFormulas.name: User posts
feedFormulas.description: This feed contains the most recent posts of a Medium user.

feedFormulas.name: User posts (custom domain)
feedFormulas.description: This feed contains the most recent posts of a Medium user on a custom domain.

feedFormulas.name: Publication posts
feedFormulas.description: This feed contains the most recent posts of a Medium publication.

feedFormulas.name: Publication tags
feedFormulas.description: This feed contains the most recent posts of a Medium publication with a specific tag.

feedFormulas.name: Tag updates
feedFormulas.description: This feed contains the most recent posts with a specific tag.

username.name: Username
username.description: The username of the Medium user. It is the part of the URL after medium.com/@.

customdomain.name: Custom domain
customdomain.description: The custom domain of the Medium user.

publication.name: Publication
publication.description: The publication name of the Medium publication. It is the part of the URL after medium.com/.

tagName.name: Tag name
tagName.description: The tag name of the Medium posts.
